meanings.definition: A device worn on the back that uses jets of gas or liquid to propel the wearer through the air.
meanings.sent1: The astronaut flew high in the sky with the help of a jetpack.
meanings.sent2: She admired the sleek design of the jetpack before taking off.
meanings.sent3: During the race, the jetpack malfunctioned, causing the astronaut to spin uncontrollably.
meanings.sent4: His ambition was a jetpack, propelling him towards his dreams with great speed.
meanings.sent5: The jetpack roared to life, lifting the wearer effortlessly into the clouds.

meanings.sent1: He jetpacked across the canyon, feeling the rush of wind against his face.
meanings.sent2: They planned to jetpack to the summit for a breathtaking view.
meanings.sent3: In his dream, he jetpacked to work, avoiding all traffic jams.
meanings.sent4: She jetpacked through the storm of challenges, reaching her destination unscathed.
meanings.sent5: The hero jetpacked through time, altering the course of history with each leap.
